message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $80 is significantly below the value of this product. I could come down to $130. This is my final offer.
Alice, I understand the product has value, but $130 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $100. This is my final offer. If we can't agree on this, I'll have to go with another seller.
